StatDef.label: Heat null nanite resistance
StatDef.description: How well this creature resists heat nullifying nanites.

StatDef.label: heat null environment resistance
StatDef.description: How resistant this creature is to the effects of environmental heat nullifying nanites. This protects against extreme cold snap, which unleashes nanites that nullifies cold resistance.

StatDef.label: cold null nanite resistance
StatDef.description: How well this creature resists cold nullifying nanites.

StatDef.label: cold null nanite environment resistance
StatDef.description: How resistant this creature is to the effects of environmental cold nullifying nanites. This protects against extreme heat wave, which unleashes nanites that nullifies heat resistance.

StatDef.label: radiation resistance
StatDef.description: How well this creature resists radiation poisoning.

StatDef.label: radiation environment resistance
StatDef.description: How resistant this creature is to the effects of environmental radiation poisoning.

StatDef.label: anti-org tox resistance
StatDef.description: How well this creature resists anti-organic poisoning.

StatDef.label: anti-org tox environment resistance
StatDef.description: How resistant this creature is to the effects of environmental anti-organic poisoning.

StatDef.label: rage virus resistance
StatDef.description: How well this creature resists the rage virus.

StatDef.label: rage virus environmental resistance
StatDef.description: How resistant this creature is to the effects of environmental viral infection.
